source.name: Generated image using the DALL-E 2 API?
source.instructions: **Which of the following examples demonstrates controlling content in the generated image using the DALL-E 2 API?**

answers.answer: "A red sports car on a blue background"
"A futuristic city skyline with flying cars and skyscrapers"
"A black and white photograph of a beach"

source.guidance:
"A futuristic city skyline with flying cars and skyscrapers"
In this example, the prompt specifies the desired content of the image by describing a futuristic city skyline with flying cars and skyscrapers. DALL-E 2 will generate an image that matches the provided description, creating a scene with the specified elements.
